ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree.  The only component currently in the game is the Lute of the Gypsy Princess.  It s going to be quite humorous to see bards scrambling like mad
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> >On Cazic-Thule. I don't know how it's possible, but he
> >assured me again today that he does have them. Either he's
> >misinformed, or the stones are already present in the world
> >and simply not well-distributed (relatively speaking).
>
> I killed over 12 hill giants yesterday and a hand full of griffons.
> Not one of them dropped a Lament Stone. I killed some green fenes
> too looking for a charm, nada. I also killed the Gargoyles in LGuk
> several times without seeing a Carapace and the shin froggies
> without seeing greave or glove.
>
> None of these items are instated on the live servers. However, they
> are pretty common finds on said monsters on Test. (ie. Aviak charms
> from Avocets - that common)

I agree. The only component currently in the game is the Lute of the Gypsy
Princess. It's going to be quite humorous to see bards scrambling like mad
come tomorrow.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)
